creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
markings: hand-applied red artist's seal: 深水 {Shinsui} | on back, red seal: 特別撰 {tokubetsu sen} (special selection) | red square publisher seal: わたなべ {Watanabe}
medium: Woodblock print, ink and color on paper
text:
Special selection (tokubetsu sen)  according to the seal on the back and it has no publisher seal on the front. for Agency for Cultural Affair written on mat.
After the painting After a Bath (Yokugo 浴後), 1975, ill. Kawakita Michiaki, Itō Shinsui, 1973, no. 195.
title: Woman After a Bath
